text: MULTI-PAXOS If the system elects a single leader that is in charge of proposing changes for some period of time, then it can skip the Propose phase. — Fall back to full Paxos whenever there is a failure. The system periodically renews who the leader is using another Paxos round. £2CMU-DB N M » PI @ 401123 8 9°wBG0n. 23 - Distributed OLTP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
